name: FitnessTracker
description: Goal of this project was creating a fitness app website, which allows users to track calories by adding meals, set nutrition goals, track body weight and workout progress

name: ChatApp
description: Goal of this project was creating a chat app website, which allows users to enter one of chat channels which are divided by topics (e.g Music, Fitness, Gaming, Gardening), to sign in use account 'test3' and password: 'Test3.user'

name: ClothesShop
description: Goal of this project was creating a shopping website which allows user to look for an item, add it to shopping cart and make an order, to sign in use email 'test@gmail.com' and password: 'test123' (login allows to add items to cart, display cart content, make orders)

name: Blog
description: Goal of this project was to create a blog website using Angular which allows user to read posts, create them, write comments, create new accounts, to sign in use account 'testUser' and password: 'test123' (login allows to comment posts and create new ones)

name: WebForum
description: Goal of this project was creating a forum website which allows user to create post and other users to comment it, give it a rating, to sign in use account 'ReactUser' and password: 'hello3' (login allows to upvote, downvote, comment posts)

name: GameStore
description: Goal of this project was creating a game store website, which allows user to  search for a products sorted by console type, add products to shopping cart and also delete it from the cart

name: FastTyping
description: This app makes it possible to practice fast typing skill, user has a strict ammount of time to enter random phrase, to send answer press enter

name: Snake
description: This is a simple snake game using canvas, to start new game press start, to move use arrow keys on keyboard
